Entries.Introduction: It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm PJ.#$e# Yes, Painful Jesus is what the PJ stands for. #$e#Ten things you should know about me, I don't want to know anything.$h
Entries.Resort_Leaving: If you get burnt, a little aloe vera cream might help soothe the skin.
Entries.Resort_Shore: I combed the whole beach for glass. We wouldn't want anyone to get a cut on their foot!
Entries.Resort_Chair: It's nice to have an opportunity to relax now and then.#$b#The trouble is actually letting go of your worries...$s
Entries.Resort_Bar: It's important to stay hydrated in this heat. I'm going to ask Gus if he has any coconut water!$h
Entries.Resort: I'll let you in on a little secret... I can only swim with floaties.$s
Entries.danceRejection: Sex is illegal in the eyes of god.$s
Entries.breakUp: ...Y...You...?$s#$b#*gulp*... I... I think I'm going to be sick...$s
Entries.dumped_Guys: I'm busy with my work. I can't speak to you.$s
Entries.secondChance_Guys: I want you back in my life, @. I'm willing to forget what happened.$s
Entries.5_1: No one lies around me, I'm the only liar around here! #$e#No I just love lying
Entries.Mon: It’s not about the journey it’s about the destination. #$e#No, reverse that. It’s about the destination, it’s not about the journey.$6 #$e#That’s exactly the same thing I just said but different. $4
Entries.Mon6: I just love being a cheeky little troll $2
Entries.Mon10: I'm trying to say something wise, but I'm not entirely sure what I'm trying to say.. $6
Entries.Tue: Anything can be badonked $3#$e#I just badonked my cat..$6
Entries.Tue8: I'm not saying that you can't be hot and catch fish. $2
Entries.Wed4: I think for the right price I could be bribed $2
Entries.Wed6: If I can scare one kid a day that personally helps me sleep better. $3
Entries.Wed8: You have a really healthy glow. That's good.$h
Entries.Wed: I know plenty more about this game than you do, sweaty.
Entries.Thu: I have prismatic shards flying out my ass $5 #$e# Oh God, I think I prismatic sharded myself. $4
Entries.Fri: one roast from me and you’ll quit the internet $2
Entries.Fri4: I saw Twilight by myself accidentally. $4
Entries.Fri10: Okay so now the silly stuff begins
Entries.Sat: If you saw a hole in a cave, would you jump into it?
Entries.Sat4: please don’t laugh at my tiny bobber.$6
Entries.Sat8: *Sigh*... I'm starting to feel kind of old...#$e#The older you get the more memories you're burdened with. It can be overwhelming.$s#$e#I think I'll stay younger with you around.$l
Entries.Sun: Willy is not getting his hands on my catfish... #$e# Would he have given me more money if I had given him my big eel?
Entries.Sun6: You've just experienced a fish ON moment. $2
Entries.event_george1: Thanks, @.$h#$b#You see, George, I'm just trying to help you.
Entries.event_george2: *Sigh*$s#$b#Look, George. If you want to behave like this I'm going to have to tell your wife. I don't think she'll be happy.
Entries.event_heart1: Oh! Hospitals make you nervous, huh?#$b#Just try and relax. I'm here to help.$h
Entries.event_heart3: Um. Okay... If you say so.$s
Entries.summer_Mon: Millions of gamers suffer every year.
Entries.summer_Thu: I know it’s tragic but sometimes you’ve got to send an egg to jail.$6 #$e#I just brought down the hammer of justice on an egg. $3
Entries.summer_Fri: Maybe I should get a fedora..
Entries.fall_Fri: if someone ever gives you the ick, just give it straight back.
Entries.fall_Sat: You guys think you can read me like a book.$4 #$e#I  I think it's time to go back to the library, motherfuckers $2
Entries.winter_Wed: You can’t see it but I’m shaking my butt.
Entries.winter_Sun: I'm not gonna build a coop, I'm gonna build a horse.#$e#I What is a horse? $6
